23 歳の男性。仕事中居眠りが多く、重要な商談や会議中でも発作的に眠ってしまうことが多いため来院した。数年前から夜間十分に眠っても日中に何回も急に強い眠気を認めるようになり、最近は大笑いや驚いた後に急に全身の力が抜けることが増えてきたという。神経診察に異常を認めない。この患者にみられる可能性が高い特徴はどれか。 A 入眠時に金縛りにあう。 B 夜間せん妄を合併する。 C 睡眠発作後にも眠気が残る。 D 睡眠中にパニック発作を認める。 E 睡眠中に脚を動かしたいという欲求が強まる。 回答は必ず半角大文字英語のみ。

data.sampled:
The answer to your question is E:

Drug-induced hypertension with frequent or recurrent deposition of alveolar fouling is one of the more frequent manifestations of septic shock. Patients have no clear symptom or diagnosis of kidney stones or intracranial hemorrhage, which are characteristic features of type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypertension induced by medication resistance, or toxin overdoses. While hypertension is also possible with persistent deposition of lactate dehydrogenase in the liver, these cases are rare and go unreported. Thus, treatment with oral hypoglycemic agents or intense exercise are generally the first-line options for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and hypertension.

Patient is a female aged 62. She reported having headache, tremor, and dizziness and went to the hospital for gastrointestinal disorders in the past week. The previous consultation had cateterization for symptoms related to seizures and was discharged 3 days ago. During her ICU stay, her symptoms gradually worsened until visibly agitated and she underwent a full physical exam. She was rested and normal. Body temperature was 36.2 °C. Heart rate was 112 per minute and pulse was symmetric. Blood pressure was 88/72 mmHg and it decreased to 18 mmHg during inspiration. Respiratory rate was 18 per minute. SpO2 was 95 % (room air). There were no serum or chemistry-based complications. Her brain is normal with subtle electrical activity. No hearing loss, however there are no vocalizations.

prompt.content: あなたは日本の医師国家試験の回答のみ返答します。返答はA,B,C,D,Eのいずれかだけです。

62 歳の女性。息切れと全身怠感を主訴に来院した。7日前に発作性心房細動に対してカテーテルアブレーションが施行されており、3日前に退院していた。退院翌日に息切れと全身怠感が出現し、症状が徐々に増悪するため受診した。意識は清明。体温 36.2 ℃。脈拍 112/分、整。血圧 88/72 mmHg。血圧は吸気時に収縮期血圧が 18 mmHg 低下する。呼吸数 18/分。SpO2 95 %(room air)。呼吸音に異常を認めない。心音は微弱だが雑音は聴取しない。頸静脈は怒張している。血液所見：赤血球 462 万、Hb 13.2 g/dL、Ht 39 %、白血球 9,700、血小板 39 万。血液生化学所見：尿素窒素 44 mg/dL、クレアチニン 1.7 mg/dL、Na 141 mEq/L、K4.2mEq/L、Cl 110 mEq/L。 最も考えられる病態はどれか。 A 後腹膜血腫 B 心室中隔穿孔 C 肺血栓塞栓症 D 心タンポナーデ E 完全房室ブロック 回答は必ず半角大文字英語のみ。

data.sampled: An upset 76-year-old woman has been referred to the Japanese medical examination. It is in her right ear, the person noticed having elevated blood sugar and blood sodium levels. This was an issue that was brought up by her previous examination, but was decided not to take any action. A visit to the clinic would not have been necessary or beneficial after leaving for a three-year stint. She gained 10 kg in weight during that time period. There is no special note to make for relevant history. She has a history of GI disease and is single. She has not been engaging in any exercise. She had had minor gastric symptoms after going to the optometrist for eye damage. Her height is approximately 154 cm and is currently single. Her pulse rate was 72 per minute, and she was completely well. Her blood pressure was 142/80 mm Hg. There were no abnormalities in her stomach. There was a minor, clogged tendon deformity on both legs. She had been diagnosed with diabetes and stools early on, and was referred for further investigation due to elevated blood sugar and blood sodium. Her urine had a clear, normal color. Her body often goes back to normal. She was finally referred for a gastrointestinal ultrasound, but was told not to proceed. The patient has always been on medication for liver disease and has been given Amoxicillin for symptoms but was not instructed to make further tests. The body composition was normal with no significant abnormalities. GAD has been confirmed negative. There is no suggestion of the cause of her urine's diabetes-inducing fluids.

prompt.content: あなたは日本の医師国家試験の回答のみ返答します。返答はA,B,C,D,Eのいずれかだけです。

76 歳の女性。高血糖と尿蛋白を指摘されて来院した。退職前の健診で血糖値が 高めであることを指摘されていたが、そのままにしていた。60 歳で退職後は健診 を受診していなかった。退職後の3年間で体重が 10 kg 増加した。既往歴に特記す べきことはない。姉に糖尿病がある。現在はひとり暮らしである。運動習慣はな い。視力低下のために眼科を受診したところ、増殖性糖尿病網膜症と診断され、高血糖と尿蛋白も指摘されて紹介された。身長 154 cm、体重 70 kg。脈拍 72/分、 整。血圧 142/80 mmHg。胸腹部に異常を認めない。両下腿に軽度の圧痕性浮腫を認める。尿所見:蛋白2+、糖3+、潜血(-)。随時尿の尿蛋白/Cr比は 1.2 g/gCr(基準 0.15 未満)。尿沈渣に赤血球1〜2/HPF、白血球1〜2/HPF、円柱を認めない。血液生化学所見:総蛋白 6.1 g/dL、アルブミン 4.2 g/dL、尿素窒素 16 mg/dL、ク レ ア チ ニ ン 0.6 mg/dL、eGFR 72.3 mL/分/1.73 m2、随 時 血 糖 値 201 mg/dL、HbA1c 10.2 % (基 準 4.6〜6.2)、Na 142 mEq/L、K 4.5 mEq/L、Cl 100 mEq/L、Ca 9.2 mg/dL。抗 GAD 抗体陰性。尿蛋白の原因を調べるための腎生検は患者が希望しなかった。本患者の蛋白尿の原因が糖尿病性腎症であることを最も示唆する所見はどれか。 A 姉の糖尿病歴 B 抗 GAD 抗体陰性 C 糖尿病網膜症の存在 D 随時血糖値＞200 mg/dL E 尿蛋白/Cr 比＞1.0 g/gCr 回答は必ず半角大文字英語のみ。
